SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SF81-Overall How You Rate Your Health
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Standard, US Version 1.0 - Overall, how would you rate your health during the past 4 weeks?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF8 v1.0 Standard - Overall How You Rate Your Health

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Standard, US Version 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, how much did physical health problems limit your usual physical activities (walking, climbing stairs)?.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF8 v1.0 Standard - How Much Limit Physical Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Standard, US Version 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, how much difficulty did you have doing your daily work, both at home and away from home, because of your physical health?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF8 v1.0 Standard - Difficulty Doing Daily Work

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SF81-How Much Bodily Pain You Have Had
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Standard, US Version 1.0 - How much bodily pain have you had during the past 4 weeks?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF8 v1.0 Standard - How Much Bodily Pain You Have Had

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SF81-How Much Energy Did You Have
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Standard, US Version 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, how much energy did you have?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF8 v1.0 Standard - How Much Energy Did You Have

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Standard, US Version 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, how much did your physical health or emotional problems limit your usual social activities with family or friends?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF8 v1.0 Standard - Physical, Emotional Limit Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Standard, US Version 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, how much have you been bothered by emotional problems (such as feeling anxious, depressed or irritable)?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF8 v1.0 Standard - Bothered by Emotional Problems

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Standard, US Version 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, how much did personal or emotional problems keep you from doing your usual work, school or other daily activities?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF8 v1.0 Standard - Emotional Problems Keep From Work

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Standard, US Version 1.0 - Physical functioning norm-based score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF8 v1.0 Standard - Physical Functioning Norm-Based Score

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Standard, US Version 1.0 - Role physical norm-based score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF8 v1.0 Standard - Role Physical Norm-Based Score

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Standard, US Version 1.0 - Bodily pain norm-based score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF8 v1.0 Standard - Bodily Pain Norm-Based Score

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Standard, US Version 1.0 - General health norm-based score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF8 v1.0 Standard - General Health Norm-Based Score

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Standard, US Version 1.0 - Vitality norm-based score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF8 v1.0 Standard - Vitality Norm-Based Score

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Standard, US Version 1.0 - Social functioning norm-based score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF8 v1.0 Standard - Social Functioning Norm-Based Score

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Standard, US Version 1.0 - Role emotional norm-based score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF8 v1.0 Standard - Role Emotional Norm-Based Score

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Standard, US Version 1.0 - Mental health norm-based score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF8 v1.0 Standard - Mental Health Norm-Based Score

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Standard, US Version 1.0 - Physical component score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF8 v1.0 Standard - Physical Component Score

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The Short Form 8 Health Survey Standard, US Version 1.0 - Mental component score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SF8 v1.0 Standard - Mental Component Score
